title: What are some especially good Dead shows for headphone listening? - Quora

response.answer_text: Barton Hall, Cornell U, 5/8/77: Grateful Dead Live at Barton Hall on 1977-05-08 : Free Download & Streaming : Internet Archive The Moore tape is the best, but only in the second set.  I think he was standing at a much better spot.  So, start at Scarlet Begonias and... from there... ENJOY!
